name: Prescribing of gluten free products
title: Gluten-free products: cost per 1000 patients
description: Cost of gluten-free products per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Gluten-free products are available on prescription for patients who have a biopsy-confirmed diagnosis of coeliac disease.
These products are also now available to purchase, e.g. from supermarkets.
consultation in 2017, the Drug Tariff was amended to only allow gluten-free breads or gluten-free food mixes on prescription.
Please note this list now excludes low-protein products which are also catagorised by dm+d and NHSBSA as being gluten-free, as
these products have different indications for ACBS use.
